title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, embeddings, tool-calling, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, RAG, plugins).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Spring Boot starters available.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for interacting with Ollama; strongly typed, async, and ergonomic.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama; use local LLMs in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; supports chat, completion, and embeddings with async streams.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app to chat with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using your local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI pipelines and dev workflows.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community Node.js wrapper for Ollama with promise and streaming support.

title: ollama-py
summary: Lightweight community Python client for Ollama; mirrors official API surface.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate published to crates.io providing typed Ollama client.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama ecosystem discussions, model tips, and troubleshooting.
